H0.text: Sunburn on the skin surface is the effect of absorption of infrared light by human skin.

H1.text: Disinfection of the skin tissues is the effect of absorption of infrared light by human skin.

H2.text: Feeling of warmth on the skin is the effect of absorption of infrared light by human skin.

H3.text: Immediate death of skin cells is the effect of absorption of infrared light by human skin.

A4.text: Infrared radiation is popularly known as 'heat radiation', but light and electromagnetic waves of any frequency will heat surfaces that absorb them.

A5.text: Infrared radiation can be used as a deliberate heating source. For example, it is used in infrared saunas to heat the occupants.
